title.rendered: Summer Intern at Baxter, Bengaluru [Electrical; EEE; ECE]: Apply Now!

content.rendered:
Online applications are invited for the role of Summer Intern- Electrical at Baxter, Bengaluru. Check the Internship details below!

About Baxter

At Baxter, we are deeply connected by our mission. No matter your role at Baxter, your work makes a positive impact on people around the world. You’ll feel a sense of purpose throughout the organization, as we know our work improves outcomes for millions of patients. Baxter’s products and therapies are found in almost every hospital worldwide, in clinics and in the home. For over 85 years, we have pioneered significant medical innovations that transform healthcare.

Responsibilities

  • Development of Electrical and electromechanical systems/sub systems by designing and conducting research and development programs; applying principles of electronics & electrical circuit design including Analog, Digital & mixed signals.
  • Creates designs of analog and digital electronic circuit for microcontroller-based systems, meeting performance objectives
  • Work on designing products with multiple power sources like AC/DC, DC/DC, Battery Pack, AA Battery.
  • Responsible for troubleshooting and problem-solving efforts related to electrical aspects of the design and interfaces with other design constituents.
  • Defines protocols and conducts the necessary testing required to verify/validate the quality, safety and performance of the design(s).
  • Contributes to development and documentation of electrical systems architectures.
  • Able to effectively transition products to manufacturing and ensure robust products and manufacturing processes.

Requirements

  • Graduate in Electronics & Communication Engineering.
  • Sound knowledge of principles of electronics & electrical circuit including Analog, Digital & Mixed signals
  • Knowledge of Altium software for creating schematics & Gerber files would be an added advantage.
  • Exposure to Phyton, Matlab would be an added advantage.
  • Exposure to PCB manufacturing & component assembly process would be an added advantage.
  • Hands on experience using some of the laboratory instruments like signal generator, oscilloscope, function generator, digital multi-meter etc.
  • A good Electromechanical project which demonstrates the skill during academics.
  • Demonstrated strong analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills, interpersonal/influencing skills

How to Apply?

Interested candidates can apply for this internship through this link.

Location

Bengaluru
